page.title: 05FAMILY LIFE-Children's view
page.content: In our families we have just our immediate relatives living with us. None of our parents have been either divorced or separated.All our parents work at sometime in the week and sometimes,if there is a young child involved,a relative will look after it.Whenever possible we all get out with the family to clubs,pubs,to visit relatives,go shopping or go on a trip to the country or the seaside. Sometimes,if one member of the family is at work,the rest of the family will still go out.We all like our families very much.One of us is an only child and would like other brothers or sisters,and some of us would prefer to have younger brothers or sisters instead. But we are happy with our families. Everything is stable.
